>
[Archwizard's Might](/Feats.aspx?ID=5053) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

You have mastered the greatest secrets of arcane magic. You gain an additional 10th-rank spell slot.
name: Archwizard's Might
